CustomField.formula: IF(TEXT(Current_DCC_Provider__c) = "Barclays", 1, IF(TEXT(Current_DCC_Provider__c) = "ConCardis", 1, IF(TEXT(Current_DCC_Provider__c) = "Elavon", 2, IF(TEXT(Current_DCC_Provider__c) = "Other", 1, IF(TEXT(Current_DCC_Provider__c) = "Fexco", 3, IF(TEXT(Current_DCC_Provider__c) = "Global Blue", 2, IF(TEXT(Current_DCC_Provider__c) = "SIX", 4, IF(TEXT(Current_DCC_Provider__c) = "Worldpay", 5, IF(TEXT(Current_DCC_Provider__c) = "No Current Provider", 0, 0)))))))))
CustomField.label: Current DCC ProviderR
